config:
echo "A man can be destroyed, but not defeated."

sensitivity 1.5

rate "786432"
fps_max "0"
cl_allow_animated_avatars "0"
cl_sniper_auto_rezoom "1"
cl_crosshair_recoil "0"
cl_hud_color "9"
r_show_build_info  0
cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_smoke 0 
cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_explosive 0 
cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_flash 0 
cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_fire 0 
cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_decoy 0
cl_grenadecrosshair_decoy 0
cl_grenadecrosshair_flash 0
cl_grenadecrosshair_fire 0
cl_grenadecrosshair_smoke 0 
cl_grenadecrosshair_explosive 0
cl_grenadecrosshair_keepusercrosshair 0 


viewmodel_presetpos 0
viewmodel_fov 66
viewmodel_offset_x 1.000000
viewmodel_offset_y 1.000000
viewmodel_offset_z -1.500000

hud_scaling 0.9
cl_hud_color 9
cl_radar_always_centered false
cl_radar_icon_scale_min	0.400000
cl_radar_rotate	true
cl_radar_scale 0.475000
cl_radar_scale_alternate 1.000000
cl_radar_square_with_scoreboard	true


bind "SPACE" "+JUMP"
bind "M" "noclip"


bind "C" "slot3; slot7"
bind "Z" "slot3; slot10"
bind "4" "slot3; slot6"
bind "X" "slot3; slot8" 
bind "0" "slot3; slot9" 
bind "T" "toggle cl_crosshairsize 1000 1"

r_fullscreen_gamma 2


joystick 0


voice_always_sample_mic	false
voice_modenable	true
voice_threshold	-30.000000

echo "FIRE IN THE HOLE"
echo "BE THE BEST YOU CAN"
echo "NEW DAY NEW OPPORTUNITIES"
echo "BE CONFIDENT :)"
